text: Parya is an endangered isolated Indo-Aryan language spoken in Uzbekistan and Tajikistan. It is extinct is Afghanistan and Pakistan. It is closely related to Hindi.https://www.sil.org/system/files/reapdata/11/26/05/112605693665137982433876189401654188162/silesr2010_014.pdf ==References== Category:Languages of Uzbekistan Category:Languages of Tajikistan Category:Indo-Aryan languages
title: Parya language
